channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Artist (Someone probably made this already but meh, ITs my version)
channel.description:
> **The Artist-BD Killer-Converts to** _The Painter_ **For the Unseen**
> **Passive-My Art Stuns-Immune to occupation and target changing** **Passive-I paint with my blood-If you are killed, blind your killer with paint, making them stunned from using there day abilities as well as the chat** **Ability(Day)-You're mere garbage-Poison a player with nightshade. If BD, it will instantly fail. 2 Uses** **Ability(Day)-Frozen Beauty-Block someone's door tonight with a statue, preventing anyone from visiting tonight. 2 Uses** **Ability(Night)-Feast Upon Beauty-Poison someone with paint tonight, Instantly killing them. oo uses** **Ability(Night)-Grand Finale-Take your own life, as well as killing three people. Bypasses night immunity. Not available till day 6**
The rest is still being worked on

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Artist (Someone probably made this already but meh, ITs my version)
item.dc:creator: Void_Magician
item.description:
The Artist-BD Killer-Converts to The Painter For the Unseen

Passive-My Art Stuns-Immune to occupation and target changing
Passive-I paint with my blood-If you are killed, blind your killer with paint, making them stunned from using there day abilities as well as the chat
Ability(Day)-You’re mere garbage-Poison a player with nightshade. If BD, it will instantly fail.
2 Uses
Ability(Day)-Frozen Beauty-Block someone’s door tonight with a statue, preventing anyone from visiting tonight. 2 Uses
Ability(Night)-Feast Upon Beauty-Poison someone with paint tonight, Instantly killing them. oo uses
Ability(Night)-Grand Finale-Take your own life, as well as killing three people. Bypasses night immunity. Not available till day 6

The rest is still being worked on

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Artist (Someone probably made this already but meh, ITs my version)
